desc: This two-volume  set (LNAI 10448 and LNAI 10449) constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 9th International Conference on Collective Intelligence, ICCCI 2017, held in Nicosia, Cyprus, in September 2017.

details.authors: Ngoc Thanh Nguyen, George A. Papadopoulos, Piotr Jędrzejowicz, Bogdan Trawiński, Gottfried Vossen

title: Computational Collective Intelligence: 9th International Conference, ICCCI 2017, Nicosia, Cyprus, September 27-29, 2017, Proceedings, Part II (Lecture Notes in Computer Science)
